divs: sighting detailsi was driving west along ford ave. in wyandotte, mi on the night of september 11, 2011. at approximately 8:30 pm, i witnessed an orange light ascend quickly from wsw, heading e toward windsor, on. it seemed to change color only once, from orange to red, then back to orange. the object did not resemble a plane. i pulled off to the side of the road and got out of my car after it had passed overhead. i turned around and watched as the object appeared to slowly hover about 80 degrees above the horizon, due east, then changed to a north\north-east heading. the sky was clear and the object appeared to be very high up, probably more than a few miles. it did not seem to make any sound and it still appeared to be increasing in altitude, like a rocket. i watched it for about another minute and a half until it disappeared. there was one other witness who rode by on a bicycle. she said she though it was a plane that was on fire.
Summary: Witnessed ascent of strange object. It looked like a rocket had launched from Western Michigan.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Wyandotte
There were no other sightings in Wyandotte on or around September 11th 2011
